main_definition: A social or romantic appointment between two people.

meanings_and_examples.definition: An instance when two individuals spend time together, usually for the purpose of getting to know each other better socially or romantically.
meanings_and_examples.example: After a few meetups at work events, they decided it was time for them to go on a date.

meanings_and_examples.definition: The fruit produced by some flowering plants.
meanings_and_examples.example: She picked the ripe dates from the palm tree in her garden and enjoyed them as a healthy snack.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To set a specific day to meet or engage with someone, typically for social or romantic purposes.
meanings_and_examples.example: They decided to schedule a date at the local Italian restaurant on Friday evening.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A particular day in an individual's life that holds significance, often personal.
meanings_and_examples.example: Today is my first date with him since we started dating again after our breakup last year.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To arrange or agree to a meeting between two parties for discussion or negotiation purposes.
meanings_and_examples.example: The company's representatives will be dating to discuss the terms of the new partnership agreement.
